summary: CHEVY'S MOTTO FOR THEIR TRUCKS ON THEIR WEBSITE IS......    " THE MOST DEPENDABLE LONG LASTING TRUCKS ON THE ROAD "     I BOUGHT A 1998 CHEVY BLAZER IN DECMBER 2001 ...........THIS TRUCK IS NOT DEPENDABLE NOR IS IT LONG LASTING.     I HAVE BEEN CONCERNED ABOUT THE RECALLS ON THIS VEHICLE.  A REPRESENTATIVE FROM CHEVY TOLD ME THAT MY VEHICLES VIN # WAS NOT PART OF THIS RECALL.     IS THERE ANY WAY I CAN VERIFY THIS WITHOUT HAVING TO PAY FOR IT?    MY VIN # IS  [XXX].      INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
